WHITE HMONG COUSCOUS

1.  LUNG PHINH MARKET
 
üáªüá≥M√àN M√âN (HMONG COUSCOUS): Grind the dry maize twice and filter through a wooded basket to avoid big lump. Add a bit of water in the corn powder and mix, then transfer it in a hollow tree trunk and steam it for 20 minutes. Take the corn powder and mix with a bit of water. Steam the second time to make sure the finished product is well cooked, fine, and dry.
 
üáªüá≥TOFU CURD: Soak the soya bean in water for 6 hours. Toss them in the machine and grind twice. Pour the soya bean in a giant pan. Add water. Keep stirring the liquid until it boils. Add shredded cabbage. Keep it boiling on low heat. Add fermented soya bean juice to coagulate the soya bean curd.
 
üêñBOILED PORK TROTTER: Boil the trotter for two hours. Cut into thin slices. Season with seasoning powder, julienned lime leaves and ginger.
 
üí∏PRICE: Couscous - $10.000 VND / 0.40 USD | Tofu Curd - $10.000 VND / 0.40 USD | Pork Trotter - 300.000 VND / $13 USD p/kg 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. MR. PHONG‚ÄôS FAMILY HOME
ADDRESS: Pho Village, Bac Ha Township, Lao Cai Province
 
üêñSMOKED STUFF INTESTINE: Mix together grilled cardamom, boiled pig lungs, chives, boiled pork fat and pig blood.Wash the intestine thoroughly. Use a funnel to stuff ingredients in. Tie a knot when finished. Hang the sausage on a tree twig for 3 months. Boil the smoked sausage for 15 minutes when serving.
 
üêñSMOKED PORK BELLY: Grill the smoked pork belly for 3 minutes, wash it thoroughly with water. Cut into thin slices. Stir-fried with oil, corn wine, and julienned ginger.
 
üáªüá≥CORN WINE: Boil and cool yellow corn, then sprinkled yeast. Incubate for 3 days then put in the timber and then put on the pan and cook in a bain-marie.

WHITE THAI - SMOKED BUFFALO

1. MS THAM‚ÄôS COMMERCIAL SMOKEHOUSE
ADDRESS: Xeo Sin Chai Village, San Thang District, Lai Chau city
üêÉSMOKED BUFFALO MEAT: Mix together minced ginger, chili powder, MSG, Thai pepper, salt and ground pepper. Rub the seasonings on 2 parts of the meat. Squeeze the meat and then let it marinate for one hour. Lay it flat on the racks and smoke for 10 hours. Hang the meat for 10 hours.
 
üí∏PRICE: $950.000 VND / 41.00  USD per kg 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. MS HAI‚ÄôS FAMILY HOME
ADDRESS: Hu·ªïi √ân Village, Phong Th·ªï District, Lai Ch√¢u Province
 
üêîSAUTEED SMOKED CHICKEN: Cut the one-week smoked chicken into bite-sized pieces. Heat up the oil in a pot then stir-fry ginger and chicken. Add water. Season with salt & MSG, then continue stirring for two minutes.
 
üêÉASH-GRILLED SMOKED BUFFALO JERKY: Ash-grill the smoked buffalo jerky for 15 minutes. Use a stone to smash the meat to get rid of the ash, and tenderize the meat. Tear the meat into bite-sized pieces. Serve with dipping sauce made of Thai pepper, salt, lime leaves, MSG & water. 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
3. VANG PHEO RESTAURANT 
ADDRESS: Vang Pheo Village, M∆∞·ªùng So Ward, Phong Th·ªï District, Lai Ch√¢u Province
 
üêõFRIED WATER CENTIPEDE: Clean water centipede with salt. Season with seasoning powder, msg, pepper & Thai pepper. Shallow fry for 15 minutes until crispy. 
 
üå±STIR-FRIED HEARTBREAK GRASS: Wash the leaves thoroughly and cut it into small pieces. Stir-fry the leaves with MSG and salt for three minutes. Crack three eggs and quickly mix it with the leaves.

BLACK THAI JUMPING FISH 

1. MR. KINH‚ÄôS FAMILY HOME
ADDRESS: Tu Le Ward, Van Chan District, Yen Bai Province
 
üçöSTICKY RICE IN BAMBOO: Wash the rice and place it in the bamboo. Add water. Cover the upper part with phrynium leaves and grill over a fire. Use a machete to cut the bamboo bark. Serve with sour buffalo skin. 
 
üêÉSOUR BUFFALO SKIN: Grill the buffalo skin and remove the hair. Boil the skin for 45 to 60 minutes. Cut the skin into thin slices and season with galangal, chilis and salt. Place in a jar for 5 to 7 days to ferment the skin.
 
üêüSOUR DECOMPOSED FISH: Cut the fish in big chunks. Roast the rice then pound it into a powder. Season fish with galangal, lemongrass, chillies, rice powder and salt. Place it in a jar for 3 to 7 days. 
 
üêüTHAI TRADITIONAL GRILLED FISH: Cut the fish open and remove the gastric acid. Marinate in lemongrass, chillies, perilla leaves, Thai pepper, salt, and minced local stinky leaves. Place inside the fish then fold fish in half. Place fish on a bamboo skewer and grill for 30 minutes. 
 
üêüFISH GASTRIC ACID DIPPING SAUCE: In a bowl, add the fish gut, local stinky leaves, salt and perilla. Pour the mixture into a bamboo trunk. Use phrynium leaves as a cork. Grill the bamboo trunk for 20 minutes. Pour it out and serve as a dipping sauce.
 
üå±GRILLED MOSS IN BAMBOO: Wash the moss and chop in small pieces. Season with garlic, chillies, lemongrass, shallot, and cilantro. Place phrynium leaves in the bamboo trunk, then add the moss in and grill on fire for 20 minutes. Remove from the bamboo and serve. 
 
üêüJUMPING FISH SALAD: Cut the banana blossom into thin slices. Squeeze it in water with salt. Mince the fish mint and normal mint. Add a bit of salt to the veggie mix. Add sour juice made from bamboo shoot pickle juice.

BLACK HMONG HUNTING 

1. MRS MY‚ÄôS FAMILY HOME
ADDRESS: Hang Co Village, Tu Le Ward, Van Chan District, Yen Bai Province
 
üçöPOUNDED STICKY RICE: Steam the black rice and place in a mortar. Pound the rice for 20 minutes. Add in boiled egg yolk and mold mixture into a ball shape. Place the pounded rice cakes on banana leaves. Place it on the grill for 10 minutes and then serve with dipping sauces: Hot chilli (MSG, chillies sauce, and salt) and pounded grilled chillies with salt.
 
üêÄBAMBOO RAT GASTRIC ACID SOUP: Add fresh Bamboo rat blood in the rice wine, and take shots. For the Gastric acid soup: Mince the intestines and stir-fry them with salt, MSG add minced ginger. Add water and cook until the soup boils. Add lime leaves and passion fruit leaves. Cook for 2 minutes then serve. 
 
üêÄSTIR-FRIED BAMBOO RAT WITH LEMONGRASS & CHILLI: Grill the bamboo rat then cut in bite-sized pieces. Stir-fry with oil, MSG, salt, garlic, lemongrass, scallion and chillies.
 
üêüGRILLED LOACH: Cut the cleaned loaches in half and remove their guts. Season with salt, MSG, garlic, chillies, lemongrass and pepper. Put them on skewers and grill on wood fire.
 
üêçSNAKE OMELETTE: Cut the cleaned snake in 10cm chunks. Mince the snake meat. Add eggs, MSG and salt. Fry it with a bit of oil, and it‚Äôs ready to serve.

BLACK HMONG WEDDING 

1. BRIDE‚ÄôS FAMILY CELEBRATION
ADDRESS: Nam Pang Village, Tu Le Ward, Van Chan District, Yen Bai Province 
 
üêÑSAUTEED BEEF: Heat up the cow fat. Add garlic, ginger, Thai pepper (prickly ash seed), pepper, lemongrass and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Add beef and fry until the beef is well cooked. 
 
üêÑSTIR-FRIED COW ORGANS: Stir-fry cow organs with salt for 1 minute. Add water celery and quickly stir then serve when it is hot. 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. GROOM‚ÄôS FAMILY CELEBRATION 
ADDRESS: Co Mong Village, Tu Le Ward, Van Chan District, Yen Bai Province

üç†BOILED ELEPHANT FOOT YAM: Cut the elephant foot yam in halves or quarters after cutting off the shell. Use sandpaper to scrub the surface. Pour whitewash water on top to refresh. Wait for 30 minutes, then flatten on a tray. Cut in small pieces then boil in water. Let it rest in cool water overnight for a lumpy texture. Cut it into bite sizes.

üêÑBEEF GASTRIC ACID SOUP: Cut the lemongrass, ginger and papaya leaves into thin pieces. Stir-fry minced cow stomach mix with gastric acid squeezed from the intestine and a little bit of water. Add all the veggies in and cook until it boils.

üêñPIG FACE BONE SOUP: Remove the meat from the pig‚Äôs face. Cut the bone in small pieces. Simmer overnight to get all umami extraction from the marrow and the bone. Add bamboo shoots in. Serve at the wedding table.

FANCIFYING MEXICAN FOOD

1. EL CAMINO
ADDRESS: 88 Xu√¢n Thu·ª∑, Th·∫£o ƒêi·ªÅn, D2, HCMC
SOCIAL: https://www.facebook.com/elcamino.d2
 
üåÆ BAJA FISH TACO: Dip the sea bass in beer batter & fry. Season with salt & gochugaru. Toast flour tortilla Assemble: Place fish, pickled red cabbage, El Camino ranch dressing, fried shallots & cilantro on tortilla. Serve with roasted tomato salsa roja & Korean chili salsa verde.
 
ü¶û LOBSTER TACO: Mango Avocado Salsa: mix together roasted garlic, avocado, diced red shallots, ripe mango, cilantro, lime juice, salt and pepper & gochugaru. Twist the tail of the lobster, removing the shell and cut to expose flesh. Separately, mix butter, roasted garlic and truffle mushroom tapenade to create a butter compound. Spread the butter compound on the lobster tail and place in the oven for 10 minutes. Toast the tortilla. Add the lobster meat to the tortilla and top with Mango Avocado Salsa and Oscietra caviar. 
 
üí∏PRICE: Baja Taco - 50.000 VND/$2.15 USD | Lobster Taco - 1.800.000 VND/$80.00 USD

2. TIPPY‚ÄôS MEXICAN FOOD
ADDRESS: 40/31 B√πi Vi·ªán, Ph∆∞·ªùng Ph·∫°m Ng≈© L√£o, Qu·∫≠n 1, HCMC
SOCIAL: https://www.facebook.com/TippysMexicanFood/

üá≤üáΩ CHEESE NACHOS: On a bed of deep fried tortilla chips, add mild white cheddar cheese. Top with refried pinto beans, lettuce, salsa and sour cream. 

üá≤üáΩ TOMAHAWK NACHOS: Deep fry tortilla. Tomahawk Steak: Season with salt, pepper, garlic powder, New Mexico chili powder and rosemary and place on the grill with butter. Cut the bone from the steak and place it on the plate. Add even more chips, mild white cheddar cheese and aged yellow cheddar cheese. Place in the oven. Remove from the oven and add refried pinto beans, lettuce, pico de gallo, onions, cilantro, sweet and creamy guacamole, sour cream, corn, cheese sauce, goat cheese, jalapenos and slices of tomahawk steak.

CHEAP VS EXPENSIVE CHICKEN üêî

1. G√Ä N∆Ø·ªöNG LU VI·ªÜT H∆Ø∆†NG 2
ADDRESS: 20 Ph·∫°m VƒÉn ƒê·ªìng street, Ward 3, G√≤ V·∫•p District, HCMC 
SOCIAL: https://www.facebook.com/ganuongluviethuong 
 
üêî GRILLED CLAYPOT CHICKEN: Season the chicken with a special homemade sauce made from salt, chilies, five spices and honey. Hang chickens in the clay pot for 30 mins, then flip the chicken and continue grilling for 15 more minutes. Take the chicken out, chop it up and assemble on a dish. Serve with bread and chili sauce.
 
üí∏PRICE: 150.000 VND/ $6.50 USD 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. SHANG GARDEN
ADDRESS: 1A ƒê∆∞·ªùng T√¥n Th·∫•t T√πng Street, Ph·∫°m Ng≈© L√£o Ward, District 1, HCMC
SOCIAL: https://www.facebook.com/shanggarden.dpg 
 
üêî FORTUNE CHICKEN: Stuff the chicken with seasoning grains, mushrooms, Chinese sausages and bamboo shoots. Rub the chicken with seasoning grains and soy sauce. Leave it for one hour. 
Steam it for another hour, then remove from the steamer and wrap it in two layers of lotus leaves. After, wrap in a thick layer of dough. Finally, bake it for 20 minutes and serve. 

üí∏PRICE: 800.000 VND/$34.60 USD 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

ADDRESS: 5 Nguy·ªÖn T·∫•t Th√†nh Street, Ward 12, District 4, HCMC

üêî STIR-FRIED SKIN WITH LIME LEAVES: De-skin the back of the chicken. Tenderize the meat then cut into slices. Season with the liquid of galangal, lemongrass and five spices. Stir-fry the chicken skin with garlic and shredded lime leaves. 
 
üêî SAUTEED OFFALS, BALLS AND BLOOD CAKE WITH GOURD: Chop up the offals and boil them with chicken balls and salt for two minutes. Season with oyster sauce, chicken powder, pepper, chicken oil and shallots. In a hot wok, add cooking oil, garlic and chopped-up shallots. Saute the gourd for another two minutes then add the rest of the ingredients to the pot. Mix and serve.

GIANT SPINY LOBSTER 

1. CALISA FOODS 
ADDRESS: 538 V√µ VƒÉn Ki·ªát Street, C·∫ßu Kho Ward, District 1, H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh City
SOCIAL: https://calisa.vn/ 
 
üí∏PRICE: 637.000 VND/ $277 USD for 7lb lobster  
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. QUINCE
ADDRESS:  37 Ky Con, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh City
SOCIAL: https://bit.ly/QuinceSG 
 
ü¶ûLOBSTER KOMBU-JIME:  Wrap lightly-salted lobster meat in kombu and plastic wrap. Chill in the fridge for more than 2 hours. | Thai seafood dressing: Blend green big and small chillies, garlic, coriander root, palm sugar, fish sauce, pickled garlic and pickled juice together. Add more coriander and a squeeze of lime, then add lime leaves oil. Finish up with xanthan gum.  Plating: Torch the banana leaf. Place two lobster slices on top. Add the brain oil (made of lobster brain and oil), Thai seafood dressing and garnish with fried garlic.
 
ü¶ûLOBSTER LEG TEMPURA: Blanch lobster for 5 minutes and then quickly move it to an ice bath. Cut it in half, then remove the flesh from the legs. Prepare the batter by mixing all purpose flour, rice flour, cornstarch with soda. Flour coat the legs and dip them in the batter, then fry. Serve with truffle aioli and a lemon cut. Garnish with a pinch of salt and truffle flakes on top of the tempura. 
 
 
ü¶ûLOBSTER PITHIVIER: Blanch lobster for 5 minutes and then quickly move it to an ice bath. Cut in half. Remove the tail meat then mix with velout√© sauce. Season with salt, pepper and butter then mix it. Add leek fondue. Place the lobster filling on a boiled Swiss chard then leave it in the freezer overnight. Roll the puff pastry. Add the filling in the middle. Seal the dough and brush with egg wash. Make a little hole on top of the pastry. Bake in the oven for 10 to 15 minutes. | Lobster jus: Fry the lobster shells and onions with a lot of oil. Add carrots, garlic, onions, celery and stir-fry then add the shells. Add tomato paste, white wine, beef stock and water. Let the sauce simmer for 1 to 2 hours. | Lobster oil: Fry the lobster shell with oil, purple onions, garlic, tomato, bell peppers. Season with bay leaf and thyme. Add tomato paste, then simmer. | Lobster jus sauce: Cook the lobster jus with butter, add lobster oil on top. Sear the lobster tail. Serve alongside the pithivier with parsnip remoulade. Pour the lobster jus sauce around the pithivier. 
 
ü¶ûBBQ LOBSTER: Blanch lobster for 5 minutes and then quickly move it to an ice bath. Cut in half. Season with salt and drizzle on olive oil. Make the kombu butter by mixing diced purple onions, rosemary, garlic, Japanese 7-flavoured powder, lemon zest, a squeeze of lemon and scallion. Mix it well. Add the lobster brain in, then cover the lobster with the butter mixture. Grill it on charcoal.  Torch lightly before serving with black bread.

GEODUCK

1. NGAN DINH RESTAURANT 
ADDRESS: Level 5, Windsor Hotel, 19 An Duong Vuong Street, District 5, HCMC
SOCIAL: https://www.windsorplazahotel.com/dining/ngan-dinh-restaurant 
 
üáªüá≥GEODUCK SASHIMI: Blanch the geoduck in a bowl of hot water. Carefully take out the skin around the neck and use a knife to remove the shell. Get rid of the internal organs. Cut it into crispy thin slices, and place on ice. Serve with wasabi and soy sauce.
 
üáªüá≥GEODUCK WITH X.O SAUCE: Cut the geoduck‚Äôs neck into thick chunks. Flour coat it and flash fry it in high heat. Blanch the mushroom and celery and then stir fry with bell pepper. Season with X.O sauce, salt, sugar and MSG. Add the geoduck then wok fry. 
 
üáªüá≥DOUBLE-BOILED SOUP WITH SLICED GEODUCK: Make the broth with pork, chicken, Jinhua ham, dried scallops, pepper and dried mandarine peel. Steam for 8 hours. Use a colander to remove all ingredients. Place geoduck thin slices over bean sprouts, fried rice sheet/cracker, julienne ginger and scallion. Boil the broth, and pour over all ingredients in a serving bowl.
 
üí∏PRICE: 3.360.000 VND/ $146 USD for each dish 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. NGOC SUONG SEAFOOD AND BAR
ADDRESS: 6a Thai Van Lung, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, HCMC 
SOCIAL: https://www.facebook.com/ngocsuongsnb/ 
 
üáªüá≥RED POMELO AND COCONUT HEART SALAD: Mix red pomelo, shredded green mango, coconut heart, onion, chocolate mint, Thai mint, geoduck, noodles and peanut. Squeeze lemon on top, and season with homemade diluted fish sauce. Place the mixture in a coconut. Add crunchy potato slices, top the dish with watermelon foam.
 
üáªüá≥NGOC SUONG ‚ÄúSPHERE‚Äù FISH SALAD SAUCE AND MARINATED GEODUCK SASHIMI: Spherify the peanut sauce. Place it on a shell and add marinated geoduck. Top it with a gold flake. Add the fume then close the lid.
 
üáªüá≥HANOIAN PUREE CONGEE WITH GEODUCK, SLOW COOKED SOFT BONE: Add minced pork, slow cooked soft bone and geoduck slices. Pour in the pureed congee. Add truffle flakes and garnish with ground pepper.
 
üáªüá≥GEODUCK COTTON CANDY: Marinate geoduck with a shot of coffee. Season the foie gras with salt and sear it on the grill. Add sugar in the cotton candy machine. Put a piece of foie gras and geoduck. Spin the stick around until the cotton candy fully coats the foie gras and geoduck.
 
üí∏PRICE: 6.384.000 VND/ $277 USD total

üáªüá≥STEAMED STINGRAY WITH LEMONGRASS & TURMERIC: Marinate stingray‚Äôs cartilage with MSG, pepper, fish sauce, oyster sauce, turmeric, galangal, onion, lemongrass, cooking oil, fermented rice and cashew nut oil. snippet.description:

COBIA

1. C Y SAO RESTAURANT
ADDRESS: H√†m Ninh Fishing Village, Phu Quoc Island, Kien Giang Province
 
üêüTRADITIONAL BRAISED COBIA: Clean the Cobia and cut the fish into large steaks. Braise the fish for 20 minutes in a broth made with minced garlic, fish sauce, sugar, MSG and cooking oil. Add fresh chillies and ground pepper. Serve with steamed rice. 
 
üêüCOBIA HOTPOT: Make the broth with shrimp satay (chilli sauce), secret spicy seasonings, sugar, salt, MSG and lemongrass. Serve with cobia head, inner organs, eggs, gills. Add onion slices on top and serve with vermicelli and vegetables.
 
üí∏PRICE: Braised Cobia - 800.000 VND / $34.00 USD | Hotpot - 600.000 VND / $26.00 USD
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. JW MARRIOTT PHU QUOC EMERALD BAY RESORT AND SPA
ADDRESS: Bai Khem, An Thoi town, Phu Quoc Island, Kien Giang Province
SOCIAL: http://bit.ly/JWMPhuQuoc
CHEF: Chef Eric | Chef De Cuisine, Pink Pearl
 
üêüAMUSE-BOUCHE: Steam the fish for 15 minutes at a rising temperature up to 100 Celsius. Mince the shiitake and hedgehog mushrooms. Season with salt. Add mushrooms in a bowl with tofu and mix. Add the cobia fillet to the mixture.. Season with Vietnamese Sichuan pepper and prickly ash. Shape them in balls, and put it in a blast chiller at -18 Celsius. Dip the balls in fry powder, egg and green young rice. Deep fry for 15 minutes and serve with Vietnamese Sichuan pepper mayonnaise.
 
üêüSTARTER: In a pan with butter, saute bits of cobia meat. Prepare the pumpkin puree (cooked for 3 hours) and crustacean jus - Crab, lobster, shellfish stock (cooked for 4 hours). Start plating crustacean jus, pumpkin puree, dried ants, cobia meat, roasted cacao nibs and thyme.
 
üêüSOUP: Prepare the broth using mushrooms, purple onions, lemongrass, ginger, dried shiitake mushrooms, turmeric, garlic, coriander, chillies in a pot. Sear the ingredients and then add water, black pepper, coriander seed and star anise. Repeat the process and then filter the broth. Add soy sauce and vinegar to the broth and leave overnight. Pan sear the cubed fish meat and flambe with Vermouth. Pan sear the hedgehog mushroom with butter. Start plating by adding the fish on the plate, mushroom, fermented black trumpet mushroom, and serve with mushroom broth.
 
üêüMAIN: Season the cobia with salt and oil then grill it on charcoal for 8 to 10 minutes. Dice the zucchini. Put the fish on the lard to melt. Sautee the zucchini with salt and pepper. Prepare the emulsion. Plate and serve.

snippet.title: FULL Christmas Meal INSIDE a PIG (including dessert)!! Extreme Pig Turducken!!
snippet.description:
üé•  SECOND CHANNEL!!! MORE BEFRS ¬ª http://bit.ly/2pQYjvM   
üëï  BEFRS BANDANAS! GET YOURS TODAY ¬ª https://bit.ly/ShopBEFRS 
üíó SUPPORT OUR MISSION¬ª http://bit.ly/BestEverPatreon    
üáªüá≥ VISIT QU√ÅN ·ª§T ·ª§T ¬ª http://bit.ly/QuanUtUtVN 

Like our music? Enjoy a free 30-day of Epidemic Sound for the best royalty free music: http://share.epidemicsound.com/BEFRS 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
HOLIDAY SPECIAL

1. QU√ÅN ·ª§T ·ª§T
ADDRESS: 47 Xu√¢n Th·ªßy, P, Qu·∫≠n 2, Th√†nh ph·ªë H·ªì Ch√≠ Minh
 
üáªüá≥ SAUSAGE: Chicago-style pepperoni sausage and spicy Italian sausage blend. Remove from casing and mix. Spread it flat onto wax paper. 
 
ü•ì BACON WEAVE: Use house-made brown sugar. Take sliced bacon and weave it to make a bacon weave sheet. Place in a cooking pan. Place in the oven for 10 min. This is the layer between turkey & goose. 
 
üáªüá≥ STUFFING: Chop celery, white onions & french baguettes into strips, then squares. Chop and add herbs (rosemary, sage & parsley). Add dried cranberries, quail eggs, salt, pepper, milk, pork fat and mix it all together. Add a few more dried cranberries on top. Place wax paper on top and press it down with a rolling pin. This is the layer between chicken & duck. 
 
üåø HERB GREMOLATA: Use lemon zest, lemon skin, rosemary, parsley, sage, chopped shallots, chopped garlic and pour in olive oil. Add salt and pepper and mix. This will be the layer between the duck & quail. 
 
üáªüá≥ BBQ LEATHER: Begin with Quan Ut Ut‚Äôs Carolina gold bbq sauce. Pour onto baking paper and then dehydrate it overnight in the smoker. 
 
üê§ BIRDS: Begin with the turkey. Lay it flat and add each layer. Lay out the bacon weave inside the turkey. Add the goose filet on top. Add the chicken filet on top of the goose. Spread stuffing on top. Add duck fillet. Spread the herb gremolata. Add 2 quail filets. Cut a strip of BBQ leather and place it on top of quail meat. Place three sparrows on top. Place one quail egg in the belly of the middle sparrow. Wrap everything up in the turkey and sew it shut. Place the ultimate turducken in the smoker to cook for about 5 hours. 
 
ü•ï ROOT VEGETABLES: Chop shallots, pumpkin and carrots and place in a mixing bowl. Add baby potatoes (whole), rosemary and sage. Add salt and pepper. Drizzle in maple syrup and olive oil and mix. Saute until it is pre-cooked. 
 
üçé BAKED APPLES: Remove the core in apples. Stuff with butter, dried cranberries and brown sugar. Wrap apples in cow caul fat. Lay the caul fat out flat. Sprinkle brown sugar on the caul fat and then dried cranberries. Place small pieces of butter around fat. Place four apples in the middle, wrap them all up together.
 
üêñ THE PIG: Slice open the pig and rub the inside with a variety of spices (paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, sugar, salt, pepper, oregano, thyme and secret ingredients). Line the stomach of the pig with the sausage blanket. Secure pig with a skewer. Insert apples in the chest cavity. Wrap the turducken in pork caul fat and insert the turducken in the stomach of the pig. Insert the root vegetables in the pig and sew it shut. Place the pig in the hot box to roast for up to 8 hours.

üêëROASTED LAMB LEG: Pour olive oil on the lamb legs. Rub seasalt and pepper on them. Place on the grill for 3 hours. Flip every 45 minutes. Spread a concoction of melted butter and garlic. | Bone in ribeye: Same process but it takes 4.5 to 5 hours to be fully cooked.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. FUME - JAPANESE FUSION CUISINE 
ADDRESS: 74/7L Hai B√† Tr∆∞ng Street, B·∫øn Ngh√© Ward, District 1, HCMC
SOCIAL: https://bit.ly/FumeVN

üç£SALMON ROE SOAKED IN TRADITIONAL SOY SAUCE: Cut open a salmon and remove the roe. Wash it thoroughly with sake, salt and water. Rinse well then add ice to avoid shrinkage. Marinate in soy sauce, seaweed, mirin wine, and water for 3 hours. Serve.

üç£SALMON ROE SUSHI: Take a small portion of rice, wrap with a seaweed leaf. Add salmon roe on top.

üç£HOKKAIDO FRESH SALMON ROE, SEA URCHIN AND SALMON TARTARE: Fry a piece of rice paper to make the base. Add salmon tartare and secret ingredients. Add an egg yolk in the middle. Put salmon roe around the yolk. Add 3 sea urchins. Have a squeeze of Yuzu lemon. Garnish with edible flowers and gold flecks then set up the smoke.

ü•ÇJAPANESE TRADITIONAL CLAYPOT: Cook the rice. Add Dashi (the broth to cook the rice) made from kelp and dried shredded fish from Hokkaido. Add 5 kinds of mushrooms to cook with the rice in the clay pot for 25 minutes After rice is cooked, add the following on top: Charcoal grilled Japanese Kuroge Beef A5 Sirloin, Salmon roe from Hokkaido, Sea urchin from Hokkaido and Homemade Japanese stewed black beef. 

üí∏ PRICE: Hokkaido Salmon Roe Dish - 440.000 VND/ $20.00 USD | Japanese Claypot - 5.000.000 / $217 USD
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
3. QUINCE
ADDRESS: 37 Ky Con Street, Ben Nghe Ward, District 1, HCMC
SOCIAL: https://bit.ly/QuinceSG

ü•ÇCAVIAR PUFFS: Prepare the puff, make a hole in each puff. Add the filling of camembert custard, pickled jalapenos and top with half a teaspoon of imperial caviar. Add the filling of hollandaise cream, caramelized chutoro tuna, and top with half a teaspoon of amur caviar.

üç§CARABINERO PRAWN TARTARE: Flour coat the head of the prawn. Fry the head of the prawn only. Season with the sauce made from the shell of the body of the prawn, a squeeze of lime, chives and top with half a teaspoon of amur caviar.

ü•ÇBORSCHT JELLY, PICKLED BEETROOTS, SMOKED CREAM AND IMPERIAL CAVIAR: Make borscht jelly at the bottom of a beetroot. Add pickled beetroot cubes, smoked creme fraiche and top with imperial caviar. Garnish with chiffonade dill. Put the beetroot top back.

ü•ÇBBQ HOKKAIDO SCALLOP, SMOKED POTATO FOAM AND OSCIETRA CAVIAR: Season the scallop with salt and olive oil. Grill the scallop in charcoal. Place seaweed, then place the scallop quarters on it. Spray potato foam on a scallop shell, top with oscietra caviar.

ü¶¥BONE MARROW WITH OSCIETRA CAVIAR: Grill a bone on charcoal for 10 minutes. Put it in a woodfire oven for another 3 minutes. Torch the marrow. Season with a pinch of ground pepper. Top with oscietra caviar. Serve with toasted bread slices.

üí∏PRICE: Bone Marrow with Oscietra Caviar - 990.000 VND/$40 USD

ü¶ê  RAW RIVER PRAWN: Clean and cut open the shrimp‚Äôs body and plate it. Garnish with carrots and herbs. Serve with salt, pepper, lime juice and wasabi.

ü¶ê  T√îM KHO T·ªò (CARAMELIZED RIVER PRAWN IN CLAYPOT): Firs, making the caramel sauce by adding cooking oil, sugar, scallion, garlic, shallots, chilli, fish sauce, chilli sauce, dark soy sauce, dried shrimp, water and pepper in a saucepan for 10 minutes until it becomes condensed. üáªüá≥ 14-DAY DRY-AGED CRISPY DUCK: Dry the duck in the refrigerator at 0-3 degrees celsius for 14 days without any marination. Grill it on open fire for two hours. üáªüá≥ 21-DAY DRY AGED CRISPY DUCK: Dry the duck in the refrigerator at 0-3 degrees celsius for 21 days without any marination. Grill it on open fire for 2 hours. STEAMED BLACK CHICKEN WITH CHINESE MEDICINE (G√Ä TI·ªÄM THU·ªêC B·∫ÆC): Steam all the medicinal ingredients for 1.5 hours then add the black chicken for another 1.5 hours. Leave them in the giant pot to keep the heat. Assemble ingredients in a clay pot and place the black chicken on top to steam for another 15 minutes before serving. Serve with green chilli sauce.

üí∏ PRICE: - 72.000 VND - $3.00 USD

ADDRESS: Baoz Dimsum Restaurant, 88 Nguy·ªÖn Tri Ph∆∞∆°ng Street, Ward 7, District 5
SOCIAL: https://www.facebook.com/BaozDimsum

BUDDHA JUMPS OVER THE WALL (PH·∫¨T NH·∫¢Y T∆Ø·ªúNG): Boil the chicken with the pork bone for 3 minutes. Put the boiled chicken in a big pot with dried tangerine skin, chicken feet and pork bone and simmer for 2 days. Chop up abalone, chicken meat, salted pork and cabbage core. Soak the deer tendon in water for 6 hours and fry. Soak the shitake mushroom in water overnight. Soak the sea cucumber in warm water for 2 days and clean with a brush. Soak the shark fin in water for 2 days and steam it with ginger and leeks for 45 more minutes. Assemble all the ingredients and then add the broth with a little bit of pepper tree flower wine and it's ready to serve.

snippet.description:

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
MAROU CHOCOLATE

1. CACAO FARM 
ADDRESS: Tien Giang Province

üç´CACAO WINE: Crack the cacao pods and remove the seeds. Separate the seeds and the pulp. Extract the juices from the pulp. Pour the juice into a pot and add sugar and natural yeast. Place over heat and stir. Pour into a plastic jug and allow it to sit and ferment. After 90 days of fermentation, cacao wine is ready.

üí∏ PRICE: Wine - 100.000 VND - $4.3 USD p/ltr | Cacao Beans - 15.000 VND/ $0.65 p/kg 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. MAROU CHOCOLATE FACTORY

üç´CHOCOLATE: The beans are dumped into the roasting machine and roasted for 25-40 minutes. The machine then separates the cacao shells from the beans. The nibs are grinded for up to 24 hours until they liquify. The liquified chocolate is poured into a machine that heats it to 50 degrees celsius and then cools it to 30 degrees celsius.  The tempered chocolate is poured into the chocolate molds before going through the conveyor belt. The machine then molds it into the shape of the chocolate bar. The bars are then inspected and packaged. 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
3. MAISON MAROU
ADDRESS: No.90 Xu√¢n Th·ªßy, Th·∫£o ƒêi·ªÅn, Qu·∫≠n 2, HCMC
INSTAGRAM: @marouchcolate

üç´CHOCOLATE BARS: Mr. Lau‚Äôs Ti·∫øn Giang Dark Chocolate, Lam Dong Chocolate & Coconut Milk Vietnamese Chocolate

üç´MAROU TIRAMISU: Place Coffee biscuit on the plate and add 1 layer of coffee chocolate chantilly, 1 layer of mascarpone cream and chocolate cacao nibs. Add a second coffee biscuit, 1 small dome of coffee chocolate chantilly, 1 layer of mascarpone cream and cacao powder decoration. 

üç´MUG MOUSSE: The outer mug is made from chocolate biscuit. Inside, there is shortbread, chocolate mousse, caramelized cashews, cacao nibs, cashew powder, chantilly, icing sugar. The mug is secured with chocolate ganache. 

üç´MAROU CLASSIC OPERA:  Use biscuit joconde for the base then add the first layer of coffee cream and a second biscuit joconde. Add the first layer of coffee ganache, then biscuit joconde, coffee ganache, biscuit joconde, coffee cream and then chocolate glacage. Finally, add chocolate triangle decorations, mini coffee macaron on the top secured with chocolate ganache and coffee ice cream with a macaron shell in the front.

üç´CHOCOLATE TART: The outside is made with a shortbread tart shell. On the inside, there are chocolate biscuits, chocolate ganache, chocolate chantilly, caramelized cashews, mini brownies with icing sugar and chocolate decorations. 

üí∏ PRICE: Bars - 100.000 VND/ $4.3 USD each | Tiramisu, Mug Mousse, Classic Opera - 150.000 VND / $5.17 USD each | Tart - 115.000 VND / $4.96 USD

KIDO FACTORY

1. RALF'S ICE-CREAM LAB

üç¶FISH SAUCE ICE-CREAM: Pour cane sugar, dextrose sugar, skim milk powder, inulin and gelatine powder in a container, mix and put aside. Mix together fish sauce, heavy whipping cream and UHT milk. Slowly add both mixtures in the Micronizer Blender. Place the mixture in the fridge for at least 12 hours. Later, take it out and pour it into the Petch Freezer for 5 minutes to pasteurize the liquid. Turn the machine to freezing mode (-8¬∫C). Last, put the ice-cream in a container and place in the fridge (-36¬∫C) for at least 30 minutes. 

üç¶PHO ICE-CREAM: Pour sugar, dry glucose, inulin and soberto in a container and put aside. Pho liquid: Add pho, broth, herbs, chilli sauce and hoisin sauce in a bowl. Filter the pho broth into a separated container and add mineral water. After that, mix in the pho noodles.  Slowly add both mixtures in the Micronizer Blender.Place the mixture in the fridge for 12 hours. Later, take it out and pour it into the Petch Freezer. Turn the machine to freezing mode. 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

üå±B√ÅNH M√å CHI√äN (FRIED BREAD WITH KETCHUP): Cut the bread into small pieces and then deep-fry. Serve with ketchup. 
 
üå±B√öN G·∫†O X√ÄO (RICE NOODLES WITH ASSORTED VEGGIE AND TOFU): Blanch the rice noodles. Stir-fry the vegetables (cabbage and mustard leaves). Deep fry the tofu then cut into pieces. Mix them all together.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. SARA ETHIOPIAN RESTAURANT
ADDRESS: 283/45 Pham Ngu Lao district 1 HCMC
SOCIAL: https://www.facebook.com/bresara11/
 
üå±FAMILY VEGGIE: Injera bread: Mix teff flour with water and yeast and let it ferment for 3 days. Pour a portion of the mixture in a pan. Cover the lid and wait for 30 seconds and then remove and roll it. | Kosta. In a pan with vegetable and garlic oil, add ground pepper and minced garlic. Add spinach then stir-fry and season with salt. | Fasolia: Saute carrots and minced garlic. Season with pepper and salt. Stir-fry then add Greek green bean cuts. | Musir wot: Saute onions and add ginger, paprika, cumin, garlic and ginger powder etc. Add water and lentils and cook until ready| Tikil Gomen: Saute carrots, garlic, turmeric, salt, and black pepper. Add cabbage and mix well. | Kik wot: Saute onions in oil and add ginger, paprika, cumin, etc. Add water and lentils. Boil and then add ginger powder and garlic. Cook until ready. | Shiro wot: Saute garlic and then add water. Flavour with chickpea powder, ginger, paprika, cumin, etc and then cook until ready. 
 
üí∏ PRICE: 600.000 VND - $25.00 USD
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
3. BABA‚ÄôS KITCHEN 
ADDRESS: 35 Le Van Mien, Thao Dien Ward, District 2
SOCIAL: https://babaskitchen.vn/
 
üå±DOSA: Pour a scoop of rice flour on a big flat pan. Add a mixture of oil and melted butter. Flat it out then roll it up. Serve with 3 chutneys: tomato, coconut, coriander with mint, and samba curries
 
üå±KERALA PARATHA: Pour oil on a stable, room temperature surface. Knead the dough by hand and then with a roller. Spread the dough out, then roll it starting from the center. Let it rest for 1 minute, then continue rolling. Put it on a flat pan with a little bit of oil. Pan fry it. Then slap it 5 times before serving. 
 
üå±HOPPERS: Pour a scoop of rice flour on a round small pan. Cover the lid and wait for 2 minutes. Take it out and serve with stewed veggies.  
 
üå±VEGGIE KURMA: Saute oil and garlic. Add diced potato, green peas, carrot and cauliflower. Stir well. Season with salt, cumin powder, paprika, ginger powder, turmeric powder. Add water. Add gravy (made of onion and cashew nuts), and another gravy (made of onion and tomato). Garnish with coriander, and it is ready to serve.
 
üí∏ PRICE: DOSA - 135.000 VND - $5.80 USD | PARATHA - 66.000 VND - $3.00 USD | HOPPERS 66.000 VND - $3.00 USD | VEGGIE KURMA - 99.000 VND - $4.00

1. TH·ªå PH√ÅT FACTORY
ADDRESS: Lot HT-F2 4&5, Hiep Phuoc Industrial Zone, Nha Be District, HCMC
SOCIAL: http://thophat.com/
FACTORY INFORMATION: Tho Phat was established in 1987 by a couple with a modest pork bun cart in the Chinatown (District 5) of Ho Chi Minh City. Focusing on the quality and affordable price, the business started to gain significant reputation and expand rapidly. Now they produce over 10,000 tonnes of food annually.

ü•üB√ÅNH BAO KHOAI M√îN (TARO BUN): Dough: Mix flour, yeast, baking flour & water. Add purple food colouring. | Filling: Steam the taro, then slow-cook with sugar for 90 minutes | Shape: Flatten the dough. Divide the dough & the filling taro paste, then wrap the dough around the filling. | Steam for 13 minutes, then cool for 1 hour.

ü•üB√ÅNH BAO NH√çM (PORCUPINE SHAPE BUN): Filling: Mix sugar, eggs, coconut milk & condensed milk, then drain the liquid to retain the solid. Steam for 20 minutes, then whip the custard to make it spongy. | Shape: Flatten the dough. Divide the dough and the custard filling, then wrap the dough around the filling. Create a peak at the end to make a shape of the porcupine tail. Use scissors to cut the dough to resemble the quills. | Steam for 13 minutes, then cool for 1 hour.

ü•üB√ÅNH BAO X√Å X√çU, TR·ª®NG C√öT, TR·ª®NG MU·ªêI (CHARSIU, SALTED EGG BUN): Filling: Grind and marinate the meat in sugar, seasoning powder, MSG, soy sauce, ground pepper, scallion, minced onion & flour. Shape: Flatten the dough. Divide the dough & meat. Add a quail egg, salted egg yolk, charsiu, and handwrap. | Steam for 21 minutes, then cool for 1 hour.

ü•üH√Å C·∫¢O TH·ªäT (PORK DUMPLINGS):Mix 4 kinds of flour to create a chewy dough. |Filling: Grind and marinate meat in sugar, seasoning powder, MSG, soy sauce, ground pepper, scallion, minced onion & flour. |Shape: Divide the filling into meatballs, and cut the dough into circles, then handwrap. | Steam for 8-10 minutes, then cool for 1 hour.

ü•üX√çU M·∫†I (SHUMAI): Mix flour, egg, and water to create dough. | Filling: Grind and marinate the meat and shrimp in sugar, seasoning powder, MSG, soy sauce, ground pepper, scallion, minced onion & flour. | Shape: Divide the filling into meatballs, and cut the dough into circles, then wrap the dough around the bun. | Steam for 8-10 minutes, then cool for 1 hour.

PORCUPINE INTESTINE SOUP (P·ªäA): Boil the intestine and then cut it into small pieces. Add ginger and the mixture of lemongrass, chillies, fish sauce, salt and seasonings. Continue adding vegetables (including herbs, basil, coriander and cilantro) and cook until it's done.

FAKE DOG MEAT: Chop up the porcupine meat-bone and place in a pot. Add lemongrass, ginger, salt, shrimp paste, seasonings, honey and fermented rice in the pot. Stir it well for 20 minutes and then add herbs.

PORCUPINE SALAD: Steam the porcupine with lemongrass, ginger and chillies. Chop the meat up and place in a bowl. Add a mixture of lemongrass, chillies, fish sauce, salt and seasonings. Continue adding MSG, herbs, stir-fried smash rice, and lime. Mix everything up and serve.

R∆Ø·ª¢U C·∫¶N (STRAW WINE): Use purple sticky rice seeds that have been raised for 8 months. Cook on firewood and then add in a clay pot to begin the 1-week fermentation process. Pour water in the pot of fermented sticky rice.

snippet.title: Traditional Nigerian Food!! Cheap Vs Expensive!!
snippet.description:
üé• SECOND CHANNEL!!! MORE BEFRS ¬ª http://bit.ly/2pQYjvM   
üëï FOOD COMA SURVIVOR SHIRTS ¬ª http://bit.ly/BEFRSMerch

Like our music? Enjoy a free 30-day of Epidemic Sound for the best royalty free music: http://share.epidemicsound.com/BEFRS  
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
TRADITIONAL + EXPENSIVE FOOD

1. WHITE HOUSE
ADDRESS: 9 Chapel St, Yaba 100001, Lagos, Nigeria

üá≥üá¨ JOLLOF RICE: Mix vegetable oil, seasoning, tomato paste, onion, salt, red chili pepper and water. Add Niger sweet rice (locally grown rice) and allow it to cook and absorb the sauce for 40 minutes. 

üá≥üá¨ POUNDED YAM: Peel yams and chop into cubes. Mix yams with very very hot water and pound with a big wooden paddle until it is soft/sticky. 

üá≥üá¨ BOILED COW SKIN: Boil cow skin in water, add salt. 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. YAKOYO ABULA JOINT
ADDRESS: 107 Ogunlana Drive, Surulere 100001, Lagos, Nigeria
SOCIAL MEDIA: @yakoyo_abulajoint

üá≥üá¨ AMALA: Dry out yam flour. In a massive pot, boil water. Add yam flour and mix until it turns black. Pour it into a new bucket and continue beating it. Serve with stew and other foods. 

üá≥üá¨ GOAT MEAT: Chop up goat meat. In a massive pot, boil water. Add goat meat. In a big cooking pan, Add palm oil and onion. Then add Tomato, red chili pepper, onion, red chili blended together - boil separately - add chicken powder and salt THEN mix in the goat meat. 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
3. ILE EROS
SOCIAL MEDIA: Chef Eros - @thebillionairechef | Ile Eros - @ile.eros

üá≥üá¨ RICE DISH: In a frying pan, add coconut sauced cream, sauteed corn and ofada rice. Mix. Add coconut sauced cream and stir.

üá≥üá¨ MASA: Cut Masa (rice cakes) in half, place suya pepper on top. In a frying pan, add butter. Place the masa face down in the frying pan and let it cook for a minute and then plate. 

üá≥üá¨ ANTELOPE DISH: In a frying pan, add butter and garlic cloves. Add antelope, parsley and more butter. Allow to cook, mixing the butter and sauce  over the antelope Place masa and salad on top. Sprinkle suya pepper.  

üá≥üá¨ GUINEA FOWL: Boil water and dip the guinea fowl in the water. Defeather, debone and butcher the guinea fowl. Slice into thin pieces and lay in a pan. Add salt, pepper and flip. Sear it in a frying pan with butter. Marinate it in a homemade palm oil habanero pepper sauce for about 3 hours. In a separate frying pan, add oil. Make a meatball out of the offbits of the guinea fowl that aren‚Äôt typically used. Fry. Mix in fried cassava flakes (garig).

MAKOKO VILLAGE

1. MAKOKO VILLAGE
ADDRESS: Lagos Lagoon, Nigeria

üá≥üá¨PANLA FISH:  Wash and scale fish. Stick a piece of wood through the tail and the head of the fish, making a ring. Place them on the fire to smoke for 12 hours. Mix baking flour, yeast, a little water, salt into a ball and fry

üá≥üá¨ONUTCHONU: In a pot, boil cooking oil with white onion, salsa (mixture of tomato, red chili pepper and red onion) and allow to boil. Add salt and fish and mix. 

üá≥üá¨OWE FUFLU:   In a pot, add palm oil. Add red onions, a spoonful of the blend of chili pepper, tomato and onions and stir. Add crayfish seasoning (red cube, crushed), salt, dried fish and stir. 

üá≥üá¨GALIDODO: Add cooking oil, onion and blend of chili pepper, red onion and tomato. Add more onion, water, dried fish, cassava flakes and mix. Add more cooking oil and mix until finished.

LAGOS STREET FOOD 2

1. OBALENDE
ADDRESS: Obalende, Lagos, Nigeria

üá≥üá¨PUFF PUFF:  Mix baking flour, yeast, a little water, salt into a ball and fry

üá≥üá¨KOKO: Begin with congealed solid millet. In a pot, add the millet and water to liquify it into a paste. In a separate big pot, boil water and pour the mixture of the liquified millet into boiling water and continuously stir it using a big wooden spoon until it thickens.

üá≥üá¨ABACHA (African Salad): Mix garden egg leaf, cassava shavings, fermented ugba (oil bean), fresh pepper, onions, garden egg, ugwun sauce, roasted fish and cow skin together in a bowl and plate in a styrofoam plate. Top with roasted fish and cow skin (ponmo), which has been marinated in fresh pepper sauce. 

üá≥üá¨TUWO AND GBEGIRI SOUP: Mix grounded corn flour in boiled water. Pour some of the liquid out. After cooking, add more grounded corn flour (dried) and beat it. Pour it back in and continue mixing

üá≥üá¨BOLI AND GROUNDNUT: Peel and grill the plantain. Dip it into the groundnut and enjoy

For the first time ever, the three biggest food and travel YouTubers are in the same...video (filmed in our separate homes). BUSHMEAT MARKET IN NIGERIA

1. OLUWO BUSHMEAT MARKET 
ADDRESS: Epe, Lagos, Nigeria

üêç Python: Chop python into medium-sized portions. Smoke over fire for 13 hours until completely dried. 

üá≥üá¨PALM WORMS: Mix the worms with onion, salt, pepper and crawfish seasoning. Boil and then roast.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. FAMILY HOME
ADDRESS: Epe, Lagos, Nigeria  

ü¶éMONITOR LIZARD: Skin the lizard and butcher it into pieces. Boil the lizard meat in water with salt, ginger and chicken seasoning. | Sauce: In a hot frying pan, add palm oil, chopped red onion and a blend of chili pepper, tomato and onion. Add water from the boiled monitor lizard and chicken seasoning and then stir until ready.

VILLAGE LIFE IN NIGERIA

1. FAMILY HOUSE 
ADDRESS: Epe, Lagos, Nigeria

üá≥üá¨ AKARA (Bean Cakes): Wash, peel and grind beans. Grind red chili pepper and onion, then mix all together with the ground beans in a bowl. Create circle bean cakes and fry in oil.  

ü•£ PAP: Add soaked ground corn mixture to boiling hot water and mix until it becomes a thick consistency. 

üêêGOAT PEPPER SOUP: Boil goat meat | Soup: Boil water and add plantain, add ground red chili pepper and onion mixture. Add lemongrass and local seasoning and allow it to boil. Add boiled goat meat and salt. Add chicken seasoning and then serve when ready. 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. MAMA J‚Äôs 
ADDRESS: Epe, Lagos, Nigeria  

üá≥üá¨·ªåB·∫∏ AND AGAGE BREAD: Beans: Pick the beans and separate them from the shaft. Pour beans into boiling water, add salt and onions. Allow beans to cook for about 30 minutes. | Meat Stew: In a pot, heat up a mixture of palm oil and groundnut oil. Add a mixture of red onion, red pepper, and tomato. Add salt and minced chicken. Cook for 20 minutes. | To Serve: Add the stew and beans into a bowl and serve with Agage Bread
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
3. AGRO-PARK
ADDRESS: Epe, Lagos, Nigeria
SOCIAL: @agroparkng

üá≥üá¨ GRASSCUTTER: In a very large cooking vessel, add chopped grasscutter, chopped red onion, chicken seasoning, salt, scent leaf and mix. Add more chicken seasoning and black pepper and continue stirring. Allow it to cook for about 15 minutes. Separately, blend red onion, tomatoes and red chili peppers. In a new cooking vessel, add oil then add the partially cooked grasscutter meat to lightly fry it. In a third cooking vessel, add oil and pour in the blended mixture of red onion, tomato and red chili pepper. Stir it around and add chopped red onion, salt, black pepper and scent leaves. Add the grasscutter. Continue stirring until it is ready.

üá≥üá¶SOUR MILK: Take fresh cow milk and mix with milk from the day before. Let it sit out and then drink. The head of the family drinks it first, to ensure it isn‚Äôt poisoned.

STREET FOOD IN YANGON

1. INDEPENDENT DAY FAIR
ADDRESS: FMI City 

WATER THIN CREPES: Fry rice flour batter in flat pan and add chickpeas and scallion. 

HUSBAND AND WIFE PANCAKES: Deep fry rice flour batter, chickpeas, quail eggs and scallion. 

QUAIL EGG SKEWERS: Place unlaid quail eggs on a skewer and deep fry

üí∏PRICE: Crepes - 500 MMK/$0.36 USD per piece | Pancakes - 1000 MMK/$0.72 USD for 7 pieces  | Quail egg skewers - 500 MMK/$0.36 USD for 3 skewers
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. THE CIRCULAR TRAIN

ü•≠MANGO SNACK: fresh mango and chilli powder 

üá≤üá≤ PAN:  Place betel nut, tobacco, lime paste and anise on a betel leaf and chew. 

üç© FRIED DOUGHNUT: pour palm sugar syrup on doughnut and enjoy 

üí∏PRICE: Mango Snack - 500 MMK/$0.36 USD | Pan - 500 MMK/$0.36 USD | Fried Doughnut - 300 MMK/$0.22 USD
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
3. KYEEMYINDAING MARKET
ADDRESS: Upper Kyeemyindaing Rd

ü•óHANDMADE SALAD:  Noodles, shrimp cake, cucumber, cabbage, tamarind sauce, fish sauce, dried shrimp powder, chickpeas powder, chilli powder, turmeric, garlic and onion oil 

üç≤FISH SOUP: Dried fish, garlic, fish sauce, bottle gourd and tofu skin 

üç≤MOHINGA: Flat noodles, chickpea fritters and broth (fish flakes, crushed peanut, lemongrass, fishcakes, egg, turmeric and onion)

ü•õGOLDEN HEART COOLER: Coconut milk, tapioca balls, strawberry jelly, pandan noodles, ice and sticky rice. 

üí∏PRICE: Single Ladies Shop - 1100 MMK/$0.80 USD | Mohinga - 1200 MMK/$0.87 USD | Cooler - 700 MMK/$0.51 USD

4. HTATE HTAR  
ADDRESS: 17th Street (Chinatown)

üêñPORK SKEWERS: Pig udder, cartilage, sausage stuffed with pork intestines, blood sausage, pork umbilical cord and pig tonsil. 

üí∏PRICE: 300 MMK/$0.22 USD per skewer

5. CHERRY MAN
ADDRESS: No 80 Latha Road

MODERN HAVANA 

1. EL CAFE
ADDRESS: Amargura #358, E/ Villegas y Aguacate, Havana

üá®üá∫BANANA OMELETTE: Mix two eggs and add chopped bananas. Prepare on the stove. Add chopped avocado and tomato on the side with pepper and olive oil drizzled on top. 

üá®üá∫PORK: Lay out two pieces of lettuce. On top, add yucca, green onion, pulled pork, gravy and chopped onions. 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. SALCHIPIZZA: 
ADDRESS:  Infanta #562 e/ Zapata y Valle, Havana
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
3. CAFE D LA ESQUINA
ADDRESS:  101 Ave Paseo esquina, Calle 5, La Habana, Cuba

üá®üá∫PICO LA ESQUINA: Mix yeast, water, flour, salt and pure soy oil. Place flour on the counter. Get a ball of dough, knead it and roll it out (like pizza). Place cheese, ropa vieja and plantain maduro frita in the middle. Fold in half and cut around the outer edge. Place in the oven and allow it to get golden brown. Spread a bit of olive oil on top. 

üá®üá∫HABANERO ROLL:  Roll out the pizza dough, add black beans, picadillo a la habanero and cheese. Roll it all up and place it in the oven to cook. Serve with salad.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
5. TAPAS FAC
ADDRESS: Calle 26, Havana 

üá®üá∫CUBANO: Start with baguette bread. Add gouda cheese, roasted pork, smoked pork, lettuce, pickles and spicy mustard. Put in the griddle to cook (until golden) then allow it to cool. PORK MARINADE: Marinate pork for 24 hours in orange and lemon juice, mint, rosemary, garlic, pepper and ginger

snippet.description:

üé• DANGEROUS CROCODILE CATCH AND COOK IN CUBA!! ¬ª https://youtu.be/6VtdcqNX9JY 
üëï SPREAD CHEESE, NOT HATE SHIRTS ¬ª http://bit.ly/BEFRSMerch

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
BARACOA 

1. SUGARCANE FARM 

üá®üá∫ SUGARCANE JUICE: Chop the sugar cane and peel it with a machete. Clean the trapiche machine. Insert the sugar cane into the trapiche to smash and extract the juice. Filter the sugar cane juice and serve. 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. CACAO FARM

üá®üá∫CACAO SAUCE: Peel and chop onions and mix in tomatoes, jalape√±os and oregano. Add all to a hot pot and stir. Add water, cacao powder and salt. Add cacao sauce and stir. 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
3. EL G√úIRITO COMMUNITY

üá®üá∫Chochirone de Baracoa: In a pot, boil a combination of coconut, water, guava, papaya and sugar for around 4 hours. After cooking, remove it from the fire and let it cool for about an hour. Create a cone, made of palm leaf, and stuff it with the Chochirone.

üá®üá∫ PASCAL DE FRITO (Grilled Golden Fish):  Sauce: In a pot, add coconut milk, achiote, chili, cilantro, garlic, onion, shaved malanga (taro) and oregano. Mix everything and then boil for 15-20 min. After boiling, add vinegar oil, water, salt and chicken flavoring. Grill the golden fish. Put onion on the fish then pour the sauce on top.

üá®üá∫CRAB BACAN: Grate coconut, add shaved cambute (banana) and some shaved banana with achiote and mix. Add sauce (mixture of cilantro, garlic, chili, oregano and crab) and continue mixing. Pour some of this mixture into a banana leaf, wrapping it almost like a tamale, and boil for 30 minutes. 

üá®üá∫MAPEN DE FRITO (Fried breadfruit): Slice breadfruit into chips. Fry until crispy 

üá®üá∫ CUBAN LECHON: Season pig and stuff with rice and vegetables. Skewer pig and roast over fire for 6-8 hours, rotating continuously. 

üá®üá∫ MORCILLA: In a bowl, mix the pig blood, add oregano, cilantro, garlic and salt together. Stuff the intestines with the pig blood mixture. Boil for 20 minutes and saute the pieces.

snippet.title: Cuba‚Äôs Secret Meat Obsession!! Dangerous Crocodile Catch and Cook!!!
snippet.description:
üé• CUBAN STREET FOOD IN HAVANA ¬ª https://youtu.be/81CjGafFVH0 
üëï SPREAD CHEESE, NOT HATE SHIRTS ¬ª http://bit.ly/BEFRSMerch
üíó SUPPORT OUR MISSION¬ª http://bit.ly/BestEverPatreon    
üì∑ ORO PADRON ¬ª IG: @oromotion 

Like our music? Enjoy a free 30-day of Epidemic Sound for the best royalty free music: http://share.epidemicsound.com/BEFRS  
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
CUBAN CROCODILE

1. CASABE FARM 
ADDRESS: Holgu√≠n, Cuba

üá®üá∫ CASABE: Peel and mash the yuca (cassava). Place in a bag and press until it‚Äôs dried and turns into a powder. Pour the yuca powder into a small circular shaped casabe mold on the grill - cook on one side for about 15 seconds. Eat with ingredients inside (like a tortilla) 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. EL ESCAPAO (Holguin) 
ADDRESS: Holgu√≠n, Cuba

üá®üá∫CASEBE (with pork): Slice pork sausage and place on the casabe, topping it with lettuce and tomato. Drizzle lime on top and eat.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
4. CRIADERO DE COCODRILOS
ADDRESS: Cienaga de Zappata, Cuba

The facility has been open for 59 years and breeds Cuban crocodiles. There are currently 4,500 crocodiles in the preservation farm. 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
4.  ALEXIS‚Äô 
ADDRESS: Cienaga de Zappata, Cuba

üêä PUNTA: Fillet the crocodile tail. Slice the tail meat into thick chunks. Drizzle olive oil on the grill. Season with salt and pepper and place on the grill. Grill for a bit. Add garlic and olive oil on top. Add onions, green pepper and red pepper and continue grilling. Drizzle with more olive oil. 

üêä CROCODILE TAIL FILLET: Take part of the tail and slice very thin (like a butterfly cut). Pour olive oil on the grill and grill fillets. Drizzle with olive oil and continue flipping sides to fully cook. Add olive oil and garlic mixture and black pepper.  Cook until ready and then add onions on top. 

üêä ENCHILADO: Filet and chop crocodile neck and inner thigh. In a pan, add tomato sauce, olive oil, red chili pepper and stir.  Continue stirring while adding more olive oil, salt and then the crocodile meat. Add black pepper and allow to simmer. When almost ready, add onions and green pepper. Allow it to cook for 5 more minutes with the lid on. Top with onion and green pepper and enjoy

snippet.title: TWISTED Cuban LECHON in Cuba!!! Pork Hammock!!
snippet.description:
üé• CUBA FOOD TOUR BEGINS ¬ª https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PtvTrOWaXPg
üíó SUPPORT OUR MISSION¬ª http://bit.ly/BestEverPatreon    
üì∑ ORO PADRON ¬ª IG: @oromotion 

Like our music? Enjoy a free 30-day of Epidemic Sound for the best royalty free music: http://share.epidemicsound.com/BEFRS  
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
FULL LECHON IN VINALES

1. BATEY LOS LORENZOS (Family house)
ADDRESS: Vinales, Cuba

üêñCUBA LECHON ASADO: Clean and cut the pig, then place it on a hammock. In each pocket of the pig, add seasoning (garlic, onion, cumin, calamondin and lime). Add salt in each pocket as well as on the skin. Place pig over an open fire and cover it with banana leaves for 3 hours. After 3 hours, flip the pig on the hammock and cook for one more hour. 

üçöCONGRI (Cuban Black Beans and Rice): In a big pot, add the dried black beans, water and bring it to a boil. In a separate bowl, mash garlic, cachucha pepper, cilantro and onion together. Add the spices/seasoning to the boiling water with the beans, then add white rice. Add pork fat and grease to the pot, mix and then allow to cook until water is absorbed.

üá®üá∫MALANGA (Fried Taro Chips): Peel the taro. Slice into circular shaped chips and fry in pork grease. Top with salt. 

üçåPLANTAIN (Fried Plantain Chips): In a pan, add pork grease and bring to a boil. Slice the plantain and fry. 

üá®üá∫YUCCA (Boiled Yucca/Cassava): Peel the yucca potatoes. Chop into large pieces and boil in water (no seasoning). Wait 20 minutes or so until cooked. 

‚òïCAF√â CUBANO (Cuban Coffee): Pick the beans from the tree. Lay the beans out on a large tarp and allow them to sit in the sun and dry. Mash the beans in a wooden bowl to remove the shells. Roast and grind the beans. Pour the ground beans into hot water and bring it to a boil. Pour the coffee into the filter.

AROUND ME BD COLLABORATION IN KUSHTIA

1. FERRY
ROUTE: Dhaka to Kushtia

üê•CHICKEN CURRY: Chicken in curry sauce, white rice and a boiled egg 

üí∏PRICE:  70 BDT / $0.82 USD
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. SHIMULIYA VILLAGE 
ADDRESS: Kushtia, Bangladesh 

üáßüá©KHICHURI: In a big pot, add oil, onion, garlic, green chili and stir for five minutes. Add buffalo fat and continue stirring. Mix in turmeric, more buffalo fat, oil and stir. Add lentils and a mixture of seasonings: salt, turmeric, chili powder, coriander powder, cardamom, ginger and cinnamon. 
Add water and allow it to cook, then pour into a fresh pot. Add rice and allow to cook. After cooking, pour in ghee and then serve. 

üáßüá©BUFFALO BIRIYANI: In a big bowl, mix cumin paste, white pepper paste, peanut paste, black pepper paste, almond paste and ginger paste. Divide this into 7 separate bowls and add cardamom seeds, black pepper corn, cinnamon, MSG, chili powder and salt. In a separate big bowl, mix together alu bukhara, cinnamon, pistachios, almonds and special cumin. Fry some onions for garnish and flavor. In a big pot, add oil then add buffalo meat. Add fried onions, the seasonings, sour curd, tomato sauce, green chili and garlic. Add the master spice (cinnamon, cardamom, cumin, mace, nutmeg and black pepper), garam masala, ghee, salt and fried onions. Cook rice with a mixture of cardamom seeds, cinnamon and saffron, powdered milk, ghee, salt, green chili, oil and fat from the buffalo meat and stir. Allow to cook. Add meat to the rice.

SEAFOOD TOUR IN CHITTAGONG

1. MEMBER HOTEL
ADDRESS: Pahartali College Road, Chittagong, BD

DRY FISH BHORTA: Clean the dried shrimp and place into the skillet/wok. Mix for about 5 minutes. Scoop the dried shrimp out of the wok onto a cooking sheet and then mash it into small pieces. Add mashed potatoes, bay leaf, salt, red chili powder, fried onion and mix. Add mustard oil and continue mixing. Serve when ready. 

TILAPIA: Paste 1: Blend tomatoes to make tomato paste | Paste 2: Blend capsicum, onion and water. | In a big bowl, marinate the tilapia with rock salt, sea salt, capsicum paste and tomato paste. Add sour yogurt, garlic paste, gira powder, red chili powder, turmeric, black pepper and mustard oil. Rub the marinade over the entire fish and into the cuts in the fish. In a massive skillet, add mustard oil and ghee. Place the marinated fish in the skillet and cook on both sides for about 5 minutes. Flip and pour more marinade on top and then serve. 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. HOTEL NIZAM
ADDRESS: Station Road, Chittagong, BD

ROOPCHADA (fried fish): Clean the fish. In a bowl, add garlic paste, ginger paste, turmeric paste, one egg and salt. Pour the mixture on top of the roopchada and then mix it all over, allowing it to marinate. Add a bit of flour to the mixture. Add the fish to the big wok with oil in it and add gravy (made with nut paste, coconut paste, turmeric paste, red chili paste, salt, water and onion). Add tomatoes, green chilis, tomato sauce and oil and allow it to cook for 15 minutes. Once cooked, Add gira powder, bay leaves and fried onions on top. 

PIGEON CURRY: Cut slices into the pigeon and marinate in a mixture of spices: turmeric, garlic paste, ginger paste, egg, chili paste. In a massive wok, fry the pigeon until it is 60 percent cooked. Separately, make a curry sauce for the pigeon with hot spices (a mixture of 5 spices including cinnamon, black pepper and elich), chopped onion, masala (ginger paste, garlic paste, turmeric paste, coconut paste, nut paste and chili paste), salt and water. Add pigeon to the curry in the wok and then add tomato sauce, gira powder and cook for 15 minutes. Add fried onions and bay leaves on top and then serve.

TRADITIONAL HONG KONG FOOD

1. LIN HEUNG TEA HOUSE 
ADDRESS: 160 - 164 Wellington Street, Central, HK
OPENING HOURS: MON - SUN: 6:00AM - 10:00PM 

üêñPIG LIVER SHUMAI: Slice pig liver, then blanch it. Season with ginger & fried garlic oil. Shape the shumai base into balls and place the liver on top. Leave for 30 minutes. Steam for 10 minutes and then serve with soy sauce, chili oil and vinegar.

üê•STEAMED CHICKEN FEET WITH BLACK BEAN SAUCE: Poach chicken feet in hot water for 30 seconds and then deep fry. Boil for 1 hour, then season with cornstarch, fried garlic oil and black bean sauce. Add chili and steam for 10 minutes.

üí∏PRICE: Shumai - 30HKD/$3.8USD | Chicken Feet  - 26HKD/$3.3USD
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. SHAM TSENG OLD TIME - YUE KEE ROAST GOOSE RESTAURANT
ADDRESS: G/F 12 Queen Victoria Street, Central, HK
OPENING HOURS: 11:00AM - 11:00PM
WEBSITE: http://yuekee.com.hk/  

üê¶CHARCOAL ROASTED GOOSE:  Season goose with sugar, five spices, salt & dried shallots and then soak in maltose water. After, hang the goose on tensile hooks for 6 hours to dry and then refrigerate it for 6 hours. Finally, roast the goose in a clay pot for an hour and serve with plum sauce.

üí∏PRICE:  680HKD/$86.87USD 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
3. LUNG KEE RESTAURANT (DRAGON RESTAURANT)
ADDRESS: 87 - 89 Man Nin street, Sai Kung, HK
OPENING HOURS: MON - SUN 7:00AM - 10:00PM
SOCIAL: https://www.facebook.com/lungkeerestaurantsheungwan/ 

üêñROASTED SUCKLING PIG: Clean the pig and flatten it on the table by cutting along its spine and fleshing out a bit of the back legs‚Äô meat. Hang the pig on a tensile hook. Soak it in hot water and then rinse with cold water. Place the pig in a sugar, salt and five spice marinade. Next, pour cold water on it and a concentrated sugar-vinegar mixture. After, place the pig in an oven for 30 minutes. Finally, dry it and hand-roast for 10 minutes. Serve with black bean sauce and sugar when ready. 

üí∏PRICE: 700HKD/$89.43USD 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
4. HAPPY TOGETHER HOTPOT 
ADDRESS: G/F 70-72 Tak Ku Ling Road, Kowloon City, HK
OPENING HOURS: MON - THU & SUN: 5:30PM - 2:00AM | FRI - SAT: 5:30PM - 3:00AM
IG: @happy_together_hotpot

üêüFISH MAW BROTH HOTPOT: Clean the fish and remove the bladder. Hotpot: Cut the winter melon in circles, then place it in the pot. Add bamboo fungus, cabbages, mushroom, yam, goji, leaks & chinese celery. Place sliced chicken in the pot. Add chinese herbs, fungus & chinese ham. Put the pot on the stove with the broth and allow it to boil with all the ingredients.

üí∏PRICE: Fish Maw - 108HKD/$13.8USD | Swim Bladder, Duck blood, Black Beef Tripe: 58HKD/$7.41USD | Fish Maw Broth: 188HKD/$24.02USD

2. Âæ∑ËààÈ≠öËõã
ADDRESS: 76 Fuk Lo Tsun Road, HK
OPENING HOURS: MON - SUN: 7:00AM - 6:00PM 

üêüFISHBALLS IN CURRY SAUCE: Use a press machine separate the flesh from the bone. Place the fish meat in a blending machine. After it‚Äôs been blended, put fish meat, salt and ice in a pounding machine for 45 mins. Shape the fish paste into shapes of balls. Deep fry the balls and serve with curry sauce.

üí∏PRICE:  10HKD/$1.28USD 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
3. CHUEN KEE RESTAURANT 
ADDRESS: 87 - 89 Man Nin street, Sai Kung, HK
OPENING HOURS: 11:30AM - 11:00PM

üêüCUTTLEFISH SASHIMI: Cut and clean the cuttlefish. Prepare a bowl full of ice and add watercress and cucumber on it. Slice the cuttlefish and place slices on top of veggies. Add lettuce, lime and flower on the bowl and serve with soy sauce and wasabi. 

üêüDEEP FRIED CUTTLEFISH HEAD: Chop the cuttlefish head into small pieces and place in a bowl with douban sauce, secret salt and pepper powder and egg flour liquid. Soak the fish in cornstarch and deep fry. Serve on a plate with chopped cabbage. Add fried garlic, fresh chilli and coriander on top.

ü¶êDEEP FRIED MANTIS SHRIMP: Clean and season the mantis shrimps with garlic and secret ingredient. Deep fry in oil for two minutes until golden brown. Add salted chilli powder, garnish with herbs  and serve. 

ü¶ûFRIED SLIPPER LOBSTER IN EGG YOLK SAUCE: Cut, clean and season the lobster. Prepare a wok and deep fry the lobster in cooking oil. In a separate pot, cook the special egg yolk sauce and then place the lobster in the sauce for 1 minute. Add flour and salted egg yolk powder and serve when ready.

üêöHONG KONG SCALLOPS: Steam with glass noodles and minced garlic

EXOTIC FOOD IN HONG KONG

1. KWAN KEE
ADDRESS: G/F, 56 Pei Ho street, Sham Shui Po, HK
OPENING HOURS: 6:00AM - 8:00PM 

ü•£CONGEE WITH THOUSAND YEAR OLD EGG & RAW BEEF: Cut a century egg into small pieces. Place in a bowl and add fried vermicelli with raw beef. Add congee and serve with a spoon of spring onion on top.

üí∏PRICE:  18HKD/ $2.3USD
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. Tung Shin Medicine 
ADDRESS: 103 Baker Street, Hung Hom, Kowloon, HK
OPENING HOURS: MON - SAT 9:00AM - 8:30PM
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
3. ËõáÁéãÂçî
ADDRESS: G/F 170 Apliu Street, Sham Shui Po, HK
OPENING HOURS: MON - SUN 11:30AM - 10:30PM 

üêûCOCKROACH AND GINSENG TEA: Place cockroach and ginseng in a clay pot with 3 cups of water. Close the pot and let it boil for 45 mins and then serve.  

ü¶éGECKO SOUP: Cut the gecko open and clean. Place its body and tail in a small pot with cow penis, dried sea horse, silk worm, pipefish and chinese medicine ingredients. Add water and cook for at least 4 hours. 

üêçSNAKE SOUP: Wash, clean and deskin the snake and then steam it for 40 minutes. Flesh its meat out of the bones and chop into small pieces. Place snake bones and pork bone broth in a pot for 4 hours. Pour some broth into another pot and add woodears, minced chicken meat, snake meat, ginger and mushrooms. Add chicken stock, corn starch liquid, chinese wine and soy sauce in the broth pot. Cook and serve when it's ready.

WARASUBO IN SAGA 

TOKI IZAKAYA
ADDRESS: 2 Chome-3-10 K≈çnohigashi, Saga, 840-0804, Japan 

üêü WARASUBO SASHIMI: Clean and carefully debone the warasubo. Put the fish head and the bones in a dish. Add slices of lime under the fish head. Add shredded radish on the dish and serve the fish with a bowl of soy sauce + yuzu (hot pepper paste) and a bowl of magani-yuke (crab salt paste).

üêü GRILLED DRIED WARASUBO: Use a hammer to soften the dried warasubo. Grill on an oven for 20 seconds. Finally, cut the fish into small pieces and serve with magani-yuke. 

üêü WARASUBO SHUMAI: Filling: Clean and wash the warasubo. Dehead the fish and put everything (fish heads and bodies) in a steamer for 10 minutes. Leave the heads aside. Take the meat out of the fish bodies and cut into slices. Add sake, soy sauce and sugar. 
Second, stuff the filling in dumpling dough paper and shape it into shumai. Apply a bit potato starch on top.  Third, add shumai in a hot pan with cooking oil and fry for 20 seconds. Add warasubo head on each of shumai pieces. Pour water into the pan and steam for another 10 minutes. Finally, put the shumai in a dish with watercress and serve. 

üí∏PRICE:  Warasubo Sashimi - ¬•700 JPY/ $6.55 USD |  Grilled Warasubo ¬•2,500 JPY/ $22.90 USD per 10

üêÑ KOBE BEEF APPETIZER: Kobe beef, boiled beef tongue, sanchu, onion, baby cabbage, purple onion, steak sauce.

üêÑ SIRLOIN KOBE BEEF: In a hot iron pan, cook onions, bell peppers, eggplant, tofu, konjac and veggies. Baste the veggies with a mixture of butter and soy sauce. Add tartar sauce and fried garlic on tofu and then remove from fire.  Remove the konjac out and plate. Squeeze a lemon on top of onions, bell peppers and eggplant and grill until golden brown. Put fresh garlic on the iron pan and add salad oil, olive oil and tartar sauce. Mix everything together. 

Place kobe steak on the hot pan and season with salt and pepper. Grill for 15 seconds on both sides. Pour melted butter and soy sauce on beef and burn it with Brandy. Remove beef and place on the fried garlic. Remove the onion mix and plate. Put spring sprouse and herbs on the hot pan and add tartar sauce, pepper and salt. Finally add soy sauce and serve.

SHIRASU IN KANAGAWA
1. ASAHI HONTEN
ADDRESS: 1-chome-4-10 Enoshima, Fujisawa, Kanagawa 251-0036
 
ü¶ê SHRIMP CRACKERS: Pour flour water into a presser. Next, soak the shrimp in potato starch then place into the pressing machine for 1 minute. Serve when cooked. 

üêü BABY SARDINE CRACKERS (Shirasu Sembei): Pour blue flour water in a pressing machine. Next, add the baby sardines on and press for 1 minute. Serve when ready. 

üí∏PRICE: Shrimp Crackers  ¬•600JPY/ $5.57USD | Shirasu Crackers ¬•500JPY/ $4.64USD
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. ENOSHIMA TOBICCHO
ADDRESS: 1-Chome-6-7 Enoshima, Fujisawa, Kanagawa 251-0036

üêü SHIRASU RICE BOWL: Add rice in the bowl and then vegetables, mayonnaise, sesame seeds and dried seaweed. Next, add boiled baby sardines, soy-sauced baby sardines and raw baby sardines in the bowl. Continue adding minced ginger, minced radish and minced spicy radish. Serve with shredded seaweed and yellow ginger. 

üí∏PRICE:  ¬•1400JPY/ $13 USD
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
3. SHONAN BURGER
ADDRESS: 251-0036 Kanagawa, Fujisawa, Enoshima, 2-Chome-1-6 1F

üçî SHIRASU BURGER: Heat the bun at 167¬∫C for 1 minute. Next, fry the shirasu chewy cake for 1 minute. Dip the shirasu cake in a bowl of soy sauce and dashi stork. Then, take the buns out, add wasabi, lettuce, shirasu cake, boiled shirasu and mayonnaise on the bun. Finally, put another bun on top and serve. 

üí∏PRICE:  ¬•800JPY/ $7.43 USD

snippet.description:

KOI FISH IN FUKUSHIMA 
1. SASA MASAMUNE BREWERY: Inago Tsukudani + Soybean Flour Mochi + Red Bean Paste Mochi + Natto + Mochi Soup

üáØüáµ INAGO TSUKUDANI (Condensed Stew Grasshoppers): Place bottle with Inago in a pot of boiling water, then wash and clean the grasshoppers. Remove the water and cook the inago for 3 mins. Place inago in a hot pan with cooking oil and stir fry in sugar, soy sauce and sake. When ready, plate the cooked grasshoppers and serve. 

üáØüáµ MOCHI: Add 1.4kg of rice into 1L of water and let it sit overnight. Rub the rice a bit and separate it from the rice water. Pour the rice in a bag, tie it and steam the whole bag for 1 hour. After that, take the rice bag out and pour the rice in the mochi mortar. Pound the rice for 20 minutes, continuously apply water on the mochi dough after each hammer hit. Finally, take the dough out and make small mochi out of it. 

üáØüáµ SOYBEAN FLOUR MOCHI: Soak mochi in soybean flour and put them on a plate. 

üáØüáµ RED BEAN PASTE MOCHI: Put mochi on a plate and top it up with red bean paste. 

üáØüáµ NATTO MOCHI (fermented soybean): Put natto on a plate, add mochi and mix them up. 

üáØüáµ MOCHI SOUP: Put mochi in a bowl. Add the soup and garnish with celery. 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. AIZU RYOKAN HIGASHIYAMA ONSEN MUKAITAKI
ADDRESS: 200 Higashiyamamachi Yumoto Kawamukai, Aizuwakamatsu 965-0814 Fukushima Prefecture

üêü KOI FISH STEW: Clean and cut the Koi Fish into 3 parts. Place the fish meat in a hot pot. Add soy sauce, sugar and homemade sake. Stew the fish for 9 hours until it‚Äôs fully cooked. Serve when ready. 

üí∏PRICE:  ¬•3255 JPY/ $30 USD - ¬•4340 JPY/ $40 USD

snippet.title: Five People DIED Eating This!!! Japan's DANGEROUS Raw Food Culture!!
snippet.description:
üëïFOOD IS PEACE SHIRTS¬ª http://bit.ly/BEFRSMerch

Welcome to byFood
Website: https://www.byfood.com/
Instagram: @JapanByFood

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
RAW FOOD TOUR IN SENDAI 

1. KOTORA RESTAURANT: Yuke + Beef Sashimi 
ADDRESS: Miyagi-ken, Chuo 1-1-1, Aoba-ku, Sendai-shi, Miyagiken

üáØüáµ YUKE (Minced Beef): Cut the wagyu into small pieces then mince them. Put them in the bowl. Second, add home-made sauce, sesame oil and a mix of vinegar and miso in the bowl and stir them well. Next, place the combination on a plate and top up with an egg yolk. Finally garnish with cucumber, green onion and sesame seeds on top of the egg, shiso flower on a side. 

üáØüáµ BEEF SASHIMI: Cut wagyu into small thin pieces. Lubricate the gloves with sesame oil to shape the cooked rice. Put wasabi on top of the beef slices. Top up the rice with beef. Finally, add soy sauce on the beef slices and put beef sashimi on a plate that already garnished with a shiso leaf.

üí∏PRICE: Yuke - ¬•1500 JPY/ $13.85 USD | Beef Sashimi - ¬•400 JPY/ $3.7USD
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. NANBU IZAKAYA:  Shark Heart
ADDRESS: Blue Ribbon Building Basement Floor - 2-417 Ichibancho, Aoba-ku, Sendai-shi, Miyagi, Japan

üáØüáµ SHARK HEART:  Wash & clean the shark heart carefully. Next, prepare a plate and add Japanese hot radish and oba leaf on the plate. After that, slice the shark heart and put those slices on the plate. Chop up the shark valves and put them next to the heart slices on the dish. Serve it with salt sesame oil mixture and garlic

üí∏PRICE:  ¬•1000 JPY/ $9.27 USD
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
3. 2ND GENERATION NIDAIME: Basashi + Torisashi 
ADDRESS: 150-0001 Tokyo, Shibuya city, Jingumae, 1 chrome 2, Japan

üáØüáµ Basashi (raw horse meat): Prepare a round plate decorated with blue glass paper. Then, cut the meat into small pieces and put them on the plate. Add hot pepper and garlic miso paste on it. Finally add some kujo onion from Kyoto on the dish and serve with soy sauce.

üáØüáµ Torisashi (chicken sashimi): Clean and slice the chicken. Place slices on a plate in a flower shape. Add kuju in the middle of the dish, wasabi and karashi (mustard) on a side. Finally serve it with soy sauce. 

üí∏PRICE:  ¬•550 JPY/ $5.09 USD

$100 RAMEN IN TOKYO 

1. 7-11 CONVENIENCE STORE: Instant Ramen 

üáØüáµ INSTANT RAMEN: Fresh noodles, char siu meat and bamboo root.

üí∏PRICE: ¬•185 JPY/ $1.7 USD 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. ORERYU SHIO RAMEN:  Genovese Ramen
ADDRESS: Shibuyaku, Jungumae, 6-29-2 Basement Floor
https://www.facebook.com/oreryushio/

üáØüáµ GENOVESE RAMEN: For the veggies: Heat up a hot pan with cooking oil. Add cabbage, bok choi, onions, carrots and mushrooms. Stir-fry them in the pan for 2 minutes. 
For the genovese noodle bowl: Add noodles in a bowl with pai-tan soup (chicken bone and pork bone soup), salt-base sauce, genovese sauce and pepper. Next, add the vegetables. Then, top up with char siu pork, bamboo shoots, spinach, green onions, soft boiled-egg marinated in soy sauce, mirin and ito-toragashi (thread hot peppers). Finally garnish with Italian parsley.

üí∏PRICE:  ¬•980 JPY/ $9.00 USD
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
3. NOODLE STAND TOKYO:  $100 Ramen
ADDRESS: 150-0001 Tokyo, Shibuya city, Jingumae, 1 chrome 2, Japan
$100 Ramen Experience:  https://www.byfood.com/experiences/most-expensive-ramen-in-tokyo-286?via=befrs 

üáØüáµ $100 RAMEN: The wagyu: Cut the wagyu into steak piece. Prepare a hot pan with cooking oil and add minced garlic and stir. Remove and place in a small bowl. Place wagyu piece in the pan and sprinkle salt and pepper. Let it fry for 10 seconds on all sides. Add mixed sauce  in the pan and cook for 1 minute. Remove the wagyu meat out and wrap it in tinfoil.
The sukizaky (long beef slices): Prepare a hot pan with soy sauce, sugar and seaweed. Dip the beef in the pan for 5 seconds then remove and put in a dish. 
The flavored oil: Add flavored oil with onion, garlic, ginger and sugar in a pot and heat up for 5 mins.
$100 noodles bowl: Prepare a big bowl with soy sauce paste, salt base sauce and milky oyster sauce. Second, pour the broth in and add noodles in the bowl. Add in the flavored oil, wagyu steak, sukiyaki meat, naganegi, white asparagus, half of seasoned egg in the bowl. Then, add some truffle oil on the beef. Finally, add bonito (dried fish flakes) and gold flakes. 

üí∏PRICE:  ¬•10900 JPY/ $100.00 USD

Japan: Japan is an island nation that boasts a contrast of both traditional and modern. With a population of over 128 million inhabitants, Japan is the 62nd largest country in the world. SAIGON SEAFOOD TOUR

1. T√îM C√ÄNG HI·ªÄN B√âO: Lobster in Tamarind Sauce
ADDRESS: 85 Nguyen Thuong Hien street, Ward 5, District 3, HCMC 

ü¶ûLOBSTER IN TAMARIND SAUCE: Clean & cut the lobster. Place lobster in a hot pan with garlic sauce & tamarind sauce. Add fish sauce, fried pork fat & chopped coriander.

üí∏PRICE:  $6.79 USD/158.000VND (200g) 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2. THANH NABI M·ª∞C KH·ªîNG L·ªí: Grilled Squid Teeth + Squid teeth in Sauce
ADDRESS: 1101A Ba Thang Hai Street, Ward 10, District 11, HCMC

ü¶ëGRILLED SQUID TEETH: Poach the squid teeth for 10 seconds then place on a charcoal stove. Flip each tooth every 5 minutes and brush with cashew oil. Cut them into small pieces & add chilli paste (chilli salt, dried chilli, fish sauce & chilli oil). Serve with coriander & cucumber. 

ü¶ëSQUID TEETH IN BUTTER-GARLIC SAUCE: Cut squid teeth into small pieces. Place into a hot pan with butter, cashew oil, condensed fish sauce, shrimp salt and onion. Serve with coriander & fried chilis on top.

üí∏PRICE: Grilled Squid Teeth $4.29 USD/100.000VND | Squid Teeth in Sauce $4.29USD/100.000VND
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
3. SKY GARDEN BBQ: Lobster Salted Egg Sauce + Fried Claw with Garlic + Fried Claw with Butter-Garlic Sauce 
ADDRESS: 823 Phan Van Tri Street, Ward 5, Binh Thanh District, HCMC

ü¶ûLOBSTER SALTED EGG SAUCE: Boil the whole lobster for 40 minutes then separate body and claws. Cut the lobster into 2 halves. For the salted egg sauce: Steam 5 salted egg yolks for 10 minutes & then put them in a bowl. Add water and smash the yolks. Add cooking oil to a skillet, pour in the salted egg sauce and stir. Put the lobster in the pan and allow it to cook with the sauce. Serve with coleslaw. 

ü¶ûFRIED CLAW WITH GARLIC: Rub the lobster claw with frying powder. Prepare a hot pan & add garlic. Place claw in the pan and fry for 1.5 mins. Remove lobster & mix with shrimp salt, onions, bell peppers, chilli and garlic. 

ü¶ûFRIED CLAW WITH BUTTER-GARLIC SAUCE: Add butter, grinded garlic, water, MSG, condensed milk, oyster oil, cashew oil and chilli sauce to a hot pan.  Place the claw in the pan and allow it to soak in the sauce for 1 minute. Remove the claw and place in a dish. Add onion slices in the pan and mix in with the sauce. Pour the sauce all over the claw and sprinkle fried garlic on top.  

üí∏PRICE:  $83.75 USD/1.950.000VND per kg of lobster

üáÆüá∑DOLME: Mix rice, fried onions, beans, herbs, turmeric, garlic, yogurt. Stuff mixture inside a grape leaf and fill pot. Add butter and water. Cook on the stove on low heat for one hour.

EXOTIC FOOD IN IRAN

1. TABAKHI‚Äå KAJ: Kaleh Pacheh + Abgoosht 
ADDRESS: Tehran, Iran

üêë KALEH PACHEH: Clean the sheep heads and place into a large cooking vessel filled with water. Add the sheep hooves and allow it to boil for one hour. After, take the broth and place in a shallow pot. Leave the sheep heads resting in the broth to soak up moisture. Place the sheep brain in broth. In a separate bowl, add the rendered sheep fat. On a platter, add cheek meat (break off the cheek meat), tongue (remove the tongue from the jaw and peel the outer layer), eyeball socket (remove eyeball socket from sheep head), full hoof, brain (broken into two pieces). Pour broth over all of the meat on the platter, keeping the meat hot and fresh. Drain the broth and add rendered sheep fat on top with cinnamon. 

üçúABGOOSHT (Meat Water): Mince cooked sheep brain meat and place in a small bowl with sheep broth, pure fat and cinnamon. Add lime to mixture and Iranian bread. 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2.  GOLE ROZE: Faloodeh 
ADDRESS: Tehran, Iran

üçúFALOODEH: Frozen wheat starch noodles in a rose water liquid/syrup. Add sour cherry syrup on top. 
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
3.  ZEYTON TALA: Yogurt Stew 
ADDRESS: Isfahan, Iran
SOCIAL MEDIA: @zeyton_tala 

ü•õYOGURT STEW: Saffron Liquid Mixture: Blend 60 grams of saffron and sugar to a powder and then mix with water. Stew Assembly: Mash stewed mutton neck and six buckets of unsweetened yogurt. Add saffron liquid mixture and sugar.

TRADITIONAL NOMAD WEDDING OF THE QASHQA'I PEOPLE

Our next stop on our Iran Food Tour brought us to a temporary settlement of the Qashqai People. The Qashqai people in Iran practice pastoral nomadism and are descendants of Turks, Lurs, Kurds, Arabs, Persians and Gypsies who settled in Iran during the 11th and 12th century. It is said that the group amounts to 400,000 people that have traveled the deserts of Southwest Iran for hundreds of years. 

SEMIROM, ISFAHAN, IRAN: Sheep + Sheep Stew + Chicken 

üêë SHEEP:  Clean and cut the sheep into small parts. Make kebabs from the offals and enjoy! 

üç≤ SHEEP STEW: In a pot, add sheep fat, butter, chunked pieces of mutton, water, garlic seeds, cumin, turmeric and salt. Simmer for  a couple hours. Serve when ready. 

üê• CHICKEN: Defeather and clean the chicken. Stuff the chicken with onion cooked in fat, pomegranate and walnuts. Sew the chicken shut. Put in a hot pot with fat. In a separate pot, fry onions. Add turmeric, cumin, garlic seeds, water, salt and stuffed chicken.
